description:
The Iwatobi Swim Club heads to Tokyo for the national tournament that Rei and Nagisa are participating in. Rei is quite nervous, but an unexpected reunion with someone from his past gives him courage... Later, when he stands at the starting block for his race, his bonds with all of his teammates, old and new, bring him back to himself. And so ends Nagisa and Rei`s last summer as high school swimmers...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 集結のストリームライン!
